sentence.Network_en: Amegilla floraea ( Smith ) Brooks and Xylocopa nasais Westwood were the most important pollinators.
sentence.Network_cn: 花无垫蜂(Amegillaflorea ( Smith ) Brooks)和竹木蜂(XylocopanasaisWestwood)是最主要的传粉者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: xylocinnamomum 肉桂, xylocopa 木蜂属, xylocitin 赛罗卡因
